name: Ariel Lopez
title: Full Stack Web Developer

summary.short: Experienced Full Stack Developer with 8+ years building scalable web and mobile applications. Skilled in Python, React, Node.js, and cloud technologies (AWS, Azure, Firebase), with a strong background in AI integrations, data scraping, and automation.
summary.detailed: I'm an experienced Full Stack Developer with over 8 years of expertise in building scalable web and mobile applications. My passion lies in crafting robust solutions from front to back, ensuring both exceptional user experiences and efficient backend performance. My technical toolkit includes React, React Native, Node.js, Python (Django, Flask), ORM, RESTful APIs, and deployment experience with GitHub Actions, Firebase, Azure, AWS, Docker, and CI/CD pipelines. I have a strong foundation in software engineering principles, SOLID design, and clean architecture.
summary.narrative: I am a Full Stack Developer with over eight years of experience designing and building scalable web and mobile applications. My technical foundation combines a strong command of Python, React, Node.js, and cloud technologies such as AWS, Azure, and Firebase, together with hands-on expertise in AI integrations, data scraping, and automation pipelines. I thrive at the intersection of clean architecture, performance optimization, and intelligent system design — blending backend robustness with intuitive frontend experiences.

projects.name: Price Check
projects.subtitle: Restaurant Supply Chain Optimization Platform
projects.description: Price Check is a full-stack web application designed to optimize restaurant supply ordering and cost management. Built for Captain's George Seafood Restaurant, the platform automates supplier price comparison, order creation, and cost analysis across multiple suppliers and unit types.

business_impact.scale: Used by 4 restaurants managing $500,000/month in orders
business_impact.efficiency: Reduces manual ordering time and pricing errors
business_impact.analytics: Provides real-time visibility into supply costs and trends

features: Supplier Price Comparison Engine - Compare prices across suppliers for equivalent items (e.g., 4-gallon vs. 4×1L containers)
Personalized Order Templates - Save and reuse custom order configurations
Automated Email Ordering - One-click email orders to suppliers with formatted specs
Invoice & Delivery Verification - Track and verify received orders against invoices
Cost Analytics Dashboard - Real-time visualization of pricing trends and savings
Recipe Cost Tracking - Calculate ingredient costs per dish for menu pricing
Role-Based Access Control - Different permission levels for managers, staff, and admins
Historical Order Data - Complete audit trail of all orders and price changes
Responsive Design - Works seamlessly on desktop and mobile devices
